oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: "National Council of Women: Federated Body of Over a Score of Great National Societies of Women to Meet Here To-Morrow"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The article discusses a future meeting of the National Council of Women of the United States in Nashville and highlights some of the notable individuals to attend, including Susan B. Anthony.

The National Council of Women of the United States is an affiliate of the International Council of Women and was established in 1888. Its officers included Frances E. Willard, Susan B. Anthony, Mary Eastman, M. Louise Thomas, and May Wright Sewall.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Nashville American
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Women--Civil Rights
Politicians; Political participation; Women; Suffrage; Susan B. Anthony
